settings.title: What's in the box?
settings.text:
Default accessories

1 x Bee Rambler Ebike(Battery & fenders included) 1 x 3A Charger 1 x Assembling Tools 1 x User Manual 2 x Pedals

View photos

settings.title: Delivery & Returns
settings.text:
• Free Shipping
    Shipping and taxes are included.
  • 2-Year Warranty
    All Bee Cool bikes cover a 2-Year Warranty from the date of receiving the item.
  • 14 Days Returns
    Customers are responsible for return shipping costs.
Continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) Geared Hub Motor
48V 21Ah Battery
Adjustable Hydraulic Fork
Rear Suspension

settings.text: 350lbs Payload Capacity
Electric Pedal-Assist
Half Twist Throttle
Aluminum Frame

settings.bottom_title:
Your Cute Loyal Servant
Carry Cargos For A Long Range

settings.text2:
FulI suspension system, reliable brakes,
advanced lighting system
SHIMANO 7-speed transmission
settings.text1:
a large capacity battery,
full suspension system, hydraulic disc
brakes and more cool features.

settings.title: Motor
settings.right_text: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!

settings.title: Battery
settings.right_text: 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life. You are able to travel over 70 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode and 45 miles on pure electric power mode. We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!

settings.title: Fork
settings.right_text: The adjustable hydraulic front fork helps you overcome bumpiness on any road conditions. You are also able to adjust different travel distances or lock the suspension depending on your riding preference.

settings.title: Rear Suspension
settings.right_text: The adjustable rear suspension system helps you overcome bumpiness on any terrain.

settings.title: Foldable Pedals
settings.right_text: The pedals are able to fold up. When you are riding under the throttle mode, you are able to put your feet on the sub pedals, which help you ride in a comfortable position. Fold up the main pedals when you don't need them!

settings.title: Sub Pedals
settings.right_text: When you are riding under the throttle mode, you are able to put your feet on the sub pedals, which just feels like riding a real motorcycle. The sub pedals help you ride in a comfortable position.

settings.title: Brakes
settings.right_text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual 180mm hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: 3A Charger
settings.right_text: We have upgraded our charger from 2A Charger to a 3A Quick Charger to save your time for charging and leave you more time on the road. The 3A version charger will help you charge the battery faster and release you from long waiting.

settings.title: Intelligent Motor
settings.text: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!
settings.text_mobile: The high-speed continuous 750W (peaking to 1100W) brushless geared hub motor with 80 Nm of max torque, which gives you a maximum power and be unstoppable on bad terrains. We’d love to let you feel the passion and enjoy the pleasure of cycling!

settings.title: Hydraulic Disc Brakes
settings.text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual 180mm hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: Hydraulic Disc Brakes
settings.text: Our ebikes are equipped with dual 180mm hydraulic disc brakes, which give you maximum stopping power. With hydraulic disc brakes, the actuation moves both pads towards the rotor at the same time and with even pressure. The most important advantage of hydraulic disc brakes is that they automatically self-adjust as they wear down.

settings.title: Large Capacity Battery
settings.text:
48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life.
You are able to travel over 80 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode
and 50 miles on pure electric power mode.
We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!
settings.text_mobile:
48V 21Ah Lithium-ion battery gives you longer battery life.
You are able to travel over 80 miles on a charge using pedal-assist mode
and 50 miles on pure electric power mode.
We want to make everyone enjoy the ride longer!

settings.text: The headlight is bright enough to let you see the road clearly in front of you when riding at nighttime.

On the left side of the handlebar, you will find the switch of the turning signal light, the horn button, and the button pad(control the power on/off, mode switch, pedal assist level, front light, etc.)
On the right side of the handlebar, you will find the shifter of the SHIMANO 7-speed gear shift system.
The wider bike seat helps a lot with easing the pressure on your body, making bike rides more comfortable.

The SHIMANO 7 speed freewheel lets you shift to a larger cog for uphill riding and downshift to a smaller cog for high-speed cycling. During the pedal-assist mode, you can control the speed better with the gear shift system.

The cadence sensor pedal assist helps you ride easily.
On pedal assist mode, you can save more physical pedal on long-distance cycling.The all-steel chain sprocket provide reliable protection to your chains and better safety when you pedal.

The integrated taillight combine with all these functions:
Night Light (turned on with the front light at the same time),
Brake Light,
Water-flow turning Signal Light

The backlight LCD display shows you all the key information and status of the ebike, including operation modes, speed, pedal assist level, battery capacity, wattmeter,battery life, odometer, trip odometer, etc.

settings.cate_text: I bought it just less than 2 weeks ago I have ridden 4 times Lots of hills here in the central Sierra of Ca I love the bike It’s capable of going anywhere I can ride And so far no issues I am looking at one for my wife——By David

Amazingly quick delivery. Ordered on Monday, Fedex delivered it 4 days later. Will assemble it and test ride tomorrow, looks to be as good of quality fabrication and components as other bikes I've looked at in stores that were 3 and 4 times the price.——By Thomas

Well worth the wait, arrived Monday, well packaged, very easy to assemble, the 4" tires really grip well in wet snowy conditions, all the mechanical, electronic components operate very smooth through transitions, many thanks to the folks at Beecool for offering such a great product at a reasonable price,...——By Jon

Wow. Ordered 1/2 and arrived 1/16 in perfect condition. Took about an hour to put it together (no hurry). Fantastic bike. Very well built with all the bells and whistles. I researched a loooong time and kept coming back to this one. Best deal around——By Jeff

Me and my buddy’s riding our life’s away….from the city to the back country loving the BEE. Went for a ride with my buddy to test her out …. Aces 😎 put 30 miles on her and she was flawless on the steep hills …. Just drop her down in a low gear and cruise up them ….Big shout out to JAZZER in customer service Thank you now to test how well she holds up …. I’m pretty hard on my toys…——By Mike

settings.desc: As the first moped-style electric bike by BeeCool, we put a lot of effort into it. From design to details, Bee Rambler shows well our technicians’ minds. First, with an adjustable hydraulic front fork and rear suspension, we want to bring you much comfort on the road. Next, we’ve also equipped it with 180mm hydraulic disc brakes and 20” X4” fat tires for greater stopping power to help you conquer more terrains and make your journey safer. Moreover, we put a strong heart in it with the 750W geared hub motor and 48V 21Ah Lithium-ion Battery to guarantee you a long durable range from 50 miles to 82 miles together with a 3A charger to release you from long waiting and leave you more time on the road.

settings.title: Where do we ship for free?
settings.text: We are currently able to ship the items to the 50 States and Washington D.C. in the U.S.We DO NOT ship to Puerto Rico, US Virgin Islands, Guam or other U.S. territories.We DO NOT ship to PO BOXES or APO.

settings.title: How long will it take to receive my ebike?
settings.text:
Please refer to the shipping date on the product page. A shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email once the order has shipped. We will use FedEx Ground or UPS Ground to ship your bike orders. 
Accessories will be shipped by USPS or DHL.
Shipping within the 48 contiguous States in the U.S. is FREE.
Shipping to the State of Alaska and Hawaii will be charged $100 shipping fee.
Accessories shipments are Free. Once the items arrived in our warehouse, please allow 2-7 business days of delivery. For any third-party shipping, we are unable to provide any additional shipping information or documentation. In addition, the delivery dates provided by BeeCool Bikes are estimated which may change as sometimes act of God may occur.

settings.title: Will my ebike arrive assembled?
settings.text: Your bike will arrive 90% assembled. We will provide the tools and a comprehensive assembly video. You can assemble your ebike within 30 minutes. If you are unable to do the assembling work, you can also add a assembling services when you purchase the bike or book a mobile service at our service page. Our processional mechanics will goes to your door directly to do the assembling work.

settings.title: Free Shipping
settings.subtitle: No need to worry about the shipping cost, we'll take care of it

settings.title: 2-Year Warranty
settings.subtitle: Get a 2-year manufacturer's warranty automatically after purchase
